name: Outgoing Webhooks
description: Send Hull Users updates as Webhooks

private_settings.name: throttle_rate
private_settings.title: Requests rate limit
private_settings.description: Number of requests done every 1 second, the same rate limit will be applied separately to each webhook url above

private_settings.name: throttle_per_rate
private_settings.title: Time window for request throughput
private_settings.description: Set the number of milliseconds to define time unit where above rate limit will be applied

private_settings.name: concurrency
private_settings.title: Requests concurrency
private_settings.description: Number of maximum concurrent, in-flight requests done by connector

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filtered Segments
private_settings.description: Global filter. Only send if user matches one of these segments

private_settings.name: webhooks_segments
private_settings.title: Send User when entering and/or leaving segments
